body: Frost giant rangers hunt big game to feed their tribes, and take point on raids.
name: Frost Giant Rangers
url: pfsrd://Monster Codex/Rules/Frost Giants/Example Frost Giants/Frost Giant Rangers

sections.ac: 27, touch 12, flat-footed 25 (+5 armor, +1 deflection, +2 Dex, +10 natural, -1 size)
sections.special_attacks: combat style (archery), favored enemy (animals +2), rock throwing (120 ft.)
sections.feats: Deadly Aim, Far Shot, Iron Will, Point-Blank Shot, Power Attack, Precise Shot, Quick Draw, Skill Focus (Stealth)
sections.gear: +1 chain shirt, +1 spear, amulet of natural armor +1, belt of incredible dexterity +2, boots of the winterlands, ring of protection +1, 2,298 gp
sections.name: Frost Giant Hunter
sections.url: pfsrd://Monster Codex/Rules/Frost Giants/Example Frost Giants/Frost Giant Rangers/Frost Giant Hunter

sections.ac: 30, touch 14, flat-footed 26 (+6 armor, +1 deflection, +3 Dex, +1 dodge, +10 natural, -1 size)
sections.special_attacks: combat style (archery), favored enemy (humans +2), rock throwing (120 ft.)
sections.feats: Dodge, Endurance, Iron Will, Mobility, Point-Blank Shot, Power Attack, Precise Shot, Quick Draw, Skill Focus (Perception), Skill Focus (Stealth), Spring Attack
sections.gear: +2 chain shirt, +1 spear, amulet of natural armor +1, belt of physical might +2 (Dex, Con), boots of the winterlands, ring of protection +1, 3,773 gp
sections.special_qualities: favored terrain (cold +2), hunter's bond (companions), track +2, wild empathy +3
sections.name: Frost Giant Elite Scout
sections.skills: Acrobatics +11 (+15 when jumping), Climb +21, Handle Animal +11, Knowledge (local) +9, Knowledge (nature) +14, Perception +30, Stealth +30 (+34 in snow), Survival +15
